text: Manfred Donike (13 June 1960 - 23 February 2003) was a German cyclist. He competed in the points race event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. His father was also a cyclist and a noted chemist. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2003 deaths Category:German male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of West Germany Category:Cyclists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:People from Erftstadt Category:Sportspeople from North Rhine-Westphalia
title: Manfred Donike (cyclist, born 1960)
